Name: BIOS Version Check
Description: Check the BIOS version of the machine and verify that it is up to date.

Results.Name: BIOS Up-to-date
Results.Description: Wether the currently installed BIOS version is the most recent version available.

Name: Intel Processor Diagnostic Tool
Description: Run IPDT and ensure that all tests pass.

Results.Name: All Tests Passed
Results.Description: Whether all of the tests in IPDT passed.

Results.Name: Score
Results.Description: Cinebench's proprietary benchmark score. Higher is better.

Name: FurMark (dGPU)
Description: A GPU rendering benchmark, run on the dedicated graphics processor.

Results.Name: Score
Results.Description: FurMark's proprietary benchmark score. Higher is better.

Results.Name: Average GPU Core Temperature
Results.Description: The average temperature of the GPU during the test, measured in Celcius. Lower is better.

Name: FurMark (iGPU)
Description: A GPU rendering benchmark, run on the integrated graphics processor.

Results.Name: Score
Results.Description: FurMark's proprietary benchmark score. Higher is better.

Results.Name: Average GPU Core Temperature
Results.Description: The average temperature of the GPU during the test, measured in Celcius. Lower is better.

Name: Heaven
Description: A benchmark that emulates playing a video game.

Results.Name: Score
Results.Description: Heaven's proprietary benchmark score. Higher is better.

Results.Name: Average GPU Core Temperature
Results.Description: The average temperature of the GPU during the test, measured in Celcius. Lower is better.

Results.Name: Average CPU Max Core Temperature
Results.Description: The average temperature of the hottest core of the CPU during the test, measured in Celcius. Lower is better.

Name: Prime95 (Small FFTs)
Description: A CPU torture test designed to output as much heat as the CPU can.

Results.Name: Average CPU Max Core Temperature
Results.Description: The average temperature of the hottest core of the CPU during the test, measured in Celcius. Lower is better.

Name: MemTest64
Description: A RAM stress test designed to test the stability of the system's memory. Test the total capacity of the system's memory, minus 2GB.

Results.Name: No Errors Detected
Results.Description: The test passed without any errors.

Name: Basics: USB Port and SD Card Reader Test
Description: Test every USB port on the machine and verify that data can be read through them.

Results.Name: Left USB-A Port Works
Results.Description: Whether data can be read through the left USB-A port.

Results.Name: Left USB-C Port Works
Results.Description: Whether data can be read through the left USB-C port.

Results.Name: Right USB-A Port Works
Results.Description: Whether data can be read through the right USB-A port.

Results.Name: SD Card Reader Works
Results.Description: Whether data can be read through the SD card reader.
